name: elymus hystrix
description: Bottlebrush Grass, Elymus hystrix or Hystrix patula, is a cool-season grass; it actively grows during the spring and fall when soil temperatures are cool. Bottlebrush Grass provides texture and interest in shaded areas. It is a staple grass in our  Savanna and  Woodland seed mixes.This seed is sold as PLS (Pure Live Seed). For example, if you order 1 lb and the PLS is 80%, you receive 1.25 lbs of bulk seed.Potted plants (3-packs and trays of 38) ship when all plants are well-rooted and transit-ready, early May through June.Â Click here if you prefer to mix/match up to 6 species in a tray.
features: Deer Resistant (Our experiences here in the Upper Midwest may vary in other regions; deer can respond differently to local conditions or seasonal variations.)
